GSD.description:
firmware: arm_scmi: Harden accesses to the reset domains

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.71 by commit 1f08a1b26cfc53b7715abc46857c6023bb1b87de. For more details please see the references link.
